trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: Ryger is immune to effects that turn undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ryger can use his Frightful Presence. He then makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of Ryger's choice that is within 120 feet of him and aware of him must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Ryger's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5–6)
entries: Ryger uses one of the following breath weapons. Acid Breath. Ryger exhales acid in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) acid damage on a failed save, and is cursed by the wretched magic binding Ryger to his post. Whenever the cursed creature is damaged by a God or a creature bound to one, the Veil over their eyes is burnt away. They are under the effects of the unveiled condition. This must be dispelled by a remove curse spell cast at 5th level within 24 hours, or the condition is permanent. On a successful save, they take half damage and are not unveiled. Slowing Breath. Ryger exhales gas in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a successful save

reaction.name: Deadly Reach
entries: In response to a creature entering a space within 15 feet of him, Ryger makes one Bite or Tail attack against that creature.
